name: Summarization Chain
semantic_context: Transforms text into a concise summary
natural_language_description: 这是 Summarization Chain 节点。主要用于: Transforms text into a concise summary

notice.displayName: Save time with an example of how this node works
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Save time with an example of how this node works

type.name: type
type.description: The type of summarization to run
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The type of summarization to run | 默认值: map_reduce
available_options: Map Reduce (Recommended) (值: map_reduce) - Summarize each document (or chunk) individually, then summarize those summaries
Refine (值: refine) - Summarize the first document (or chunk). Then update that summary based on the next document (or chunk), and repeat.
Stuff (值: stuff) - Pass all documents (or chunks) at once. Ideal for small datasets.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
